  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move​(Worker worker, int desiredX, int desiredY, Island island) throws InvalidMovementException, WinningException
      Artemis overrides the move method SPECIAL EFFECT: Artemis can move a second time without going back to starting position
      Overrides:
      move in class Card
      Parameters:
      worker - A worker of the actual player
      desiredX - X Position where the player wants to move the worker
      desiredY - Y Position where the player wants to move the worker
      island - The current board of game
      Throws:
      InvalidMovementException - If the movement is not valid throw a new exception.
      WinningException - If the player won, throw a WinningException

    • resetBehaviour

      public void resetBehaviour()
      Reset the behaviour of the Player to the default value of the card and reset the starting position.
      Overrides:
      resetBehaviour in class Card
